messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Digest Number 4536
messages.msgSnippet: ... From:  To:  Sent: Friday, March 12, 2004 7:43 PM HI back atcha Elizabeth!!!!!
messages.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: <UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com>
To: <UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, March 12, 2004 7:43 PM

HI back atcha Elizabeth!!!!!

Deb S--

Sorry I was not clear. I meant symptoms often clear with treament with
antibiotics. Borrelia is a screw shaped bacteria that gets into the CNS and
causes a myriad of symptoms, asperger's and ADD among them. Also MS, Lupus,
ALS, 100% if Alzheimer's post mortem testing of brain has shown presence of
Borrelia. I have a wonderful best friend with Aspergers who developed it
after two tick bites. He is such a gift!! I know your daughter is too.
I had all symptoms of Parkinson's two years ago. That is gone with abx
treatment, which continues. Don't mean to labor the point but on the other
hand I can't undo what I know to be true in many cases. Its a curse to know
about it sometimes, as I feel morally obligated to speak up. Another friend
now stands to gain much of her life back after finding out she didn't after
all have Parkinsons or MS or all the other stuff they were looking for. She
has LD.
Terri

>
> My dh and I have brought her a long way from where she was at three.
> Emily is Aspergers will always be Aspergers no matter how well she
> blends in with everyone else. It is a different way of thinking and
> seeing the world.
>
> They have found the longer you wait to help them the harder it is to
> gain ground.
>
> Deb S.
>
>
>
> ________________________________________________________________________
> ________________________________________________________________________
>
